memories.content:
Successfully implemented mcp-sem-4aireporter MCP server with:
- Same structure as mcp-tg-jira-seminarapp 
- Resources instead of tools (following MCP_SPEC.md exactly)
- Proper URI pattern: quality://sem-4aireporter/{data_type}/{project_id}
- Response formats matching spec for requirements, test_cases, bugs, test_executions
- Data fetching from same JIRA/Zephyr APIs with authentication
- Transformation functions for mapping data to spec-compliant schemas
- All code quality checks passing (ruff format + check)
- Server initialization working correctly
memories.context: Completed building mcp-sem-4aireporter following user's Rule #1 and Rule #2

memories.content: User executed get_test_executions after major fixes for test execution status mapping issue. Previous issue: all executions showed "NOT_EXECUTED" status. Fixed by implementing map_zephyr_execution_status function with comprehensive status mapping (PASSED->PASS, FAILED->FAIL, etc.) and multiple fallback field extraction from Zephyr API responses. Also fixed JSON-RPC protocol issue where debug print statements were interfering with STDIO transport.
memories.context: Testing fixed test execution status mapping after debugging session

memories.content: User reports test executions still show "NOT_EXECUTED" status despite having executed test cases, and execution time shows today's date instead of actual execution dates. Need to debug real Zephyr API response structure to fix field extraction.
memories.context: Debugging test execution status and date mapping issues

memories.content: Fixed test execution field mapping by simplifying extraction logic. Removed complex fallback logic and mapped fields directly from Zephyr API: executionStatus.name for status, executedOn/executionDate for dates, executedBy.displayName for user, environment.name for environment, testCycle.build/version for build info. Removed debug logging that was interfering with JSON-RPC protocol.
memories.context: Simplified field mapping for test executions based on user feedback

memories.content: Successfully implemented direct field mapping for Zephyr test executions based on real API response structure. Key mappings: actualEndDate for execution time, testExecutionStatus.id mapped to status names (9156748=PASS, 9156746=FAIL), test case key extracted from testCase.self URL, executedById for user, comment for failure reason. No more complex logic - simple 1:1 field mapping.

Fixed all field mappings for bugs, test cases, requirements, and test executions with direct 1:1 API field mapping. Key fixes: German JIRA priorities ("4-Sehr hoch"â†’CRITICAL), Zephyr status/priority IDs mapped correctly, complex ADF description parsing for requirements, actualEndDate for execution times, testExecutionStatus.id for execution status. All mappings now use actual API response structures without complex logic.
memories.context: Completed comprehensive field mapping fixes for all data types

memories.content: User feedback for next evolution: 1) Progress bars unclear (Requirements/Test Cases full, Executions/Bugs not), 2) AI Story page needs visuals (currently text-only), 3) Future outlook is static, 4) Not using ticket details effectively for insights (bug summaries, req descriptions). Need comprehensive improvements.
memories.context: User feedback for major improvements to MCP reporting system
